text: Zorion Eguileor (born 15 March 1946) is a Spanish actor, singer and broadcaster. He is best known worldwide for his role as Trimagasi in the movie The Platform (2019). His television credits include Qué grande es el teatro, Cuéntame cómo pasó, Mi querido Klikowsky, La que se avecina, El tiempo entre costuras and Estoy vivo. Eguileor was born in Mundaka, Basque Country. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Radio personalities Category:Spanish singers Category:Spanish television actors
title: Zorion Eguileor
